title: Red Alert 2 Mental Omega
description:
Red Alert 2 Mental Omega
Unattended installation
ra2.exe - 390 MB

contents:
-red alert 2 (ripped music + videos)
-yuri's revenge (ripped music + videos) (you cannot play yuri, play mental omega instead its better)
-mental omega mod 2.0c (full with music) -> http://mo.cncguild.net/
patches:
-ra2 patch v1.0006
-yuri patch v1.0001
-npatch v0.22 (required for mental omega mod)
-lan patch v1.00 (May 24, 2008) (makes ra2 and mods use UDP protocol instead of IPX) <a href="
http://www.understorm.net/cnc/lan/ts_ra2.php" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.understorm.net/cnc/lan/ts_ra2.php</a>

notes:
-makes shortcuts in a folder GAMEZ on your DESKTOP
ra2 is for red alert 2
ra2trainer is for the ra2 trainer (it also works on mental omega)
ra2ymo is for mental omega mod

-when playing mental omega insert any cd/dvd or mount ANY image :)
-for lan play you have to change serial located in "woldata.key" only one digit required to be changed
-make sure you dont have any firewalls blocking the game on lan/internet
-if you installed IPX protocol Uninstall it

custom video resolution:
from the game menu 1024x768 is the maximum resolution but you can set it to whatever you want
just search for these 3 lines in ra2.ini or ra2md.ini (this is for yuri & yuri mods)
i left it at 640x480
[Video]
ScreenWidth=640
ScreenHeight=480

multiplayer troubleshooting: <a href="
http://www.wikihow.com/Play-Red-Alert-2-over-the-Internet" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.wikihow.com/Play-Red-Alert-2-over-the-Internet</a> <a href="
http://blog.lib.umn.edu/ayubx003/dividebyzero/2008/06/02/how_to_play_red_alert_2_over_l.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://blog.lib.umn.edu/ayubx003/dividebyzero/2008/06/02/how_to_play_red_alert_2_over_l.html</a>

i worked really hard on bringing you this
please seed so others can get it too
